docs.title: Welcome to techdocs-sample

docs.text: Helper Functions This page documents some common helper functions used throughout the project. format_date(date_string) Formats a date string into YYYY-MM-DD format. Parameters date_string ( str ): The date as a string in any common format. Returns str : Formatted date string. Example formatted = format_date("03/09/2025") print(formatted) # Output: "2025-09-03" calculate_total(items) Calculates the total price of a list of items. Parameters items ( list ): List of items, each with a price field. Returns float : The total price. Example items = [{"price": 10.5}, {"price": 20.0}] total = calculate_total(items) print(total) # Output: 30.5
docs.title: Helper Functions

docs.text: Formats a date string into YYYY-MM-DD format. Parameters date_string ( str ): The date as a string in any common format. Returns str : Formatted date string. Example formatted = format_date("03/09/2025") print(formatted) # Output: "2025-09-03"

docs.text: Calculates the total price of a list of items. Parameters items ( list ): List of items, each with a price field. Returns float : The total price. Example items = [{"price": 10.5}, {"price": 20.0}] total = calculate_total(items) print(total) # Output: 30.5
